moves.name: Bug Buzz
moves.effect: Has a very small chance of lowering the target’s Sp. Def.

moves.name: Blizzard
moves.effect: Never misses during a hailstorm. Has a very small chance of leaving the target frozen.

moves.name: There, There...
moves.effect: Raises the user’s evasiveness and critical-hit rate. Restores a bit of the user’s HP and charges the user’s move gauge by two in a pinch.

passives.name: Endurance
passives.description: If the Pokémon enters battle with full HP, allows it to endure the next hit it takes that would reduce it to 0 HP.

passives.name: Move Gauge Refresh 4
passives.description: Has a good chance of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.

passives.name: Positive Reinforcement 3
passives.description: Drastically raises the user’s Attack and Sp. Atk when it knocks out an opponent with a move.
